headline: Emerson Electric Set For Growth In The Second Half Of 2025
summary: Emerson Electric targets growth in megatrends like aerospace, energy, and automation while managing risks and reducing debt. Click to find out why EMR is a Buy.

headline: Emerson Electric Co. (EMR): An Undervalued Dividend Aristocrat to Buy Now
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Undervalued Dividend Aristocrats to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Emerson Electric Co. (NYSE:EMR) stands against other undervalued dividend aristocrats. Dividend-paying stocks are regaining popularity this year as investors look for ways to soften the blow of current market […]
